SAINT.Name: Venerable Theodosius the Great, Founder of Coenobitic Monasticism (+ 529)
(The service for St Theodosius is transferred to whichever day the Ecclesiarch should appoint)
Venerable Michael the Fool-for Christ, of the Klops Monastery in Novgorod (+ c. 1453-1456)
Holy Hierarch Theodosius, Metropolitan of Trapezunt
New Hieromartyrs Priests Nicholas, Theodore, and Vladimir (+ 1919)
Elets Icon of the Mother of God (1060)
